name: Slip Stream
description:
A game created for GGJ 2021. Theme: Duality

Controls:

Left-Right | A-D | Left click-Right click- Move

Escape - Pause/Sound Settings

R - Restart

Credits:

Programming: Jose Pacio, Zach Linblad

Art: Marlowe Dobbe

Design: Anthony Giovanetti, Jose Pacio, Zach Linbald, Marlowe Dobbe

Music: Peter Karman
